  REFRESH_TOKEN: '/auth/refresh-token',
  FORGOT_PASSWORD: '/auth/forgot-password',
  RESET_PASSWORD: '/auth/reset-password',
  // User endpoints
  USER_PROFILE: '/user/profile',
  UPDATE_PROFILE: '/user/profile/update',
  CHANGE_PASSWORD: '/user/change-password',
  // Job endpoints

  JOB_DETAIL: id => `/jobs/${id}`,
  JOBS_SEARCH: '/jobs/search',

  SAVE_JOB: id => `/jobs/${id}/save`,
  APPLIED_JOBS: '/jobs/applied',
  SAVED_JOBS: '/jobs/saved',
  // Company endpoints
  COMPANIES: '/companies',
  COMPANY_DETAIL: id => `/companies/${id}`,
  COMPANIES_SEARCH: '/companies/search',
  COMPANY_JOBS: id => `/companies/${id}/jobs`,
  // Resume endpoints
  RESUMES: '/resumes',
  RESUME_DETAIL: id => `/resumes/${id}`,
  UPLOAD_RESUME: '/resumes/upload',
  // Contact endpoints
  CONTACT: '/contact'
};

sourcesContent:
export const API_ENDPOINTS = {
  // Auth endpoints
  LOGIN: '/auth/login',
  REGISTER: '/auth/register',
  LOGOUT: '/auth/logout',
  REFRESH_TOKEN: '/auth/refresh-token',
  FORGOT_PASSWORD: '/auth/forgot-password',
  RESET_PASSWORD: '/auth/reset-password',

  // User endpoints
  USER_PROFILE: '/user/profile',
  UPDATE_PROFILE: '/user/profile/update',
  CHANGE_PASSWORD: '/user/change-password',

  // Job endpoints
  JOBS: '/jobs',
  JOB_DETAIL: (id: string) => `/jobs/${id}`,
  JOBS_SEARCH: '/jobs/search',
  APPLY_JOB: (id: string) => `/jobs/${id}/apply`,
  SAVE_JOB: (id: string) => `/jobs/${id}/save`,
  APPLIED_JOBS: '/jobs/applied',
  SAVED_JOBS: '/jobs/saved',

  // Company endpoints
  COMPANIES: '/companies',
  COMPANY_DETAIL: (id: string) => `/companies/${id}`,
  COMPANIES_SEARCH: '/companies/search',
  COMPANY_JOBS: (id: string) => `/companies/${id}/jobs`,

  // Resume endpoints
  RESUMES: '/resumes',
  RESUME_DETAIL: (id: string) => `/resumes/${id}`,
  UPLOAD_RESUME: '/resumes/upload',

  // Contact endpoints
  CONTACT: '/contact'
};
